sentences.en: But the scribble I put on the back as a child wasn't to be found.
sentences.cn: 但我放在后面的作为孩子的杂文不见了.

sentences.en: Don't scribble [ scrawl ] on the wall.
I attempted to scribble down the names.
sentences.cn: 我努力匆匆地写下那些名字。

sentences.en: I can make nothing of all this scribble.
sentences.cn: 这样潦草的笔迹我一点也看不懂.
我看不懂这种潦草的字.

sentences.en: I decided to scribble out the messed up areas and rework them.
sentences.cn: 我决定涂掉那些一团糟的地方,去重画.

sentences.en: I'm sorry what I wrote was such a scribble.
sentences.cn: 很抱歉我写得如此潦草。

sentences.en: In the unlikely event of anybody phoning, could you just scribble a message down?
sentences.cn: 虽然可能性极小，但如果有人打来电话，你能不能随手把留言记下来？

sentences.en: Keep the cabin clean. Do not litter or scribble.
sentences.cn: 四、保持乘座舱内清洁, 请勿乱丢果皮、纸屑、随意涂写.

sentences.en: Offer your child thick crayons and paper to scribble on.
sentences.cn: 提供些粗蜡笔及厚纸任孩子涂鸦.

sentences.en: She can't write yet, but she loves to scribble with a pencil.
sentences.cn: 她现在还不会写字, 但她喜欢用铅笔乱涂.

sentences.en: Someone had scribbled all over my picture.
sentences.cn: 有人把我的画涂得乱七八糟。

sentences.en: Sometimes I scribble addresses too sloppy when I jot'em.
sentences.cn: 有时我总是把地址写得很潦草.

sentences.en: The child loves to scribble with a pencil.
sentences.cn: 这孩子喜欢用铅笔乱涂.

sentences.en: The teacher told his students not to scribble in their books.
sentences.cn: 老师告诉学生们不要在书上乱写.

sentences.en: This is Scribble With Unique Thougts and Incisive Words.
sentences.cn: 这是一本有着独一无二的思想和敏锐的措辞的涂鸦.

words.tran_cn: 三流作家；小文人；潦草书写的人

trans.tran_cn: 潦草书写，乱写，拙劣文字，粗制滥造的文章
trans.tran_en: untidy writing that is difficult to read
to draw marks that have no meaning

trans.tran_cn: 潦草地书写，乱写，胡写，滥写（文学作品等），[印，纺]粗梳
